name: Old World [2014-2021 Edition]
description:
After almost 6 years I decided to release this one - a game made before

"Weapon of Doomsday". It uses all my prototype and test levels - fully remastered!

Keep in mind that it's made on very first version of FPS Creator!

This game HAS a story:

Your hometown has been invaded by some mysterious and powerful

militaristic Sect. You are Armis Spherr - just another town girl

who got captured by Sect's henchmen. You need to escape and stop

the terrorists from taking over the world! Good luck and godspeed!

Special Thanks:

The Game Creators

My lovely sister

And remember - this game is FREE!

The game is now Version 1.2. Most issues are fixed.
